content: 2 row of double_crochet all around the top doing 2dc in the outside corners to give a sharp square look do 1 extra row of slip_stitch all around to finish off attach the pair of store-bought handles to the high edges as shown in photo © di scaysbrook 2023 fibrefest 2023 - crocheted bag we look forward to seeing photos of your finished items © di scaysbrook 2023
